txt.en: 'Bound to land, we started our journey back toward Anfalas to report. Those we rescued were burdensome, but duty bound us to protect them, and so we did. The wilder lands of Anfalas proved a challenge, but we made our way to the nearest port and reported in to the authorities.\n\n'We received a reprimand and were forced to return to Pelargir to aid in the construction of our new ship.'
'We set sail only a few months after being shore-bound. I noticed it then, a change in the captain.'
With the Nenglor rebuilt, the mariner's tale seems to be taking a different turn.
Falnavar and the captain make a trek back to Pelargir after losing their ship, but not all is well when they arrive.
There is no twist in this mission.
After a harsh reprimand for the loss of their ship, the captain set about building the Nenglor anew.
